https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2KTRe1wIS2YY1hvDsu5IcO70zcF.jpg Spain, 1808. The Napoleonic Army suffers its first defeat at the hands of a single man: a drummer boy who used the Montserrat mountains to echo his drums and send the enemy troops into a panicked retreat. When the news reaches Napoleon, he furiously orders the captain of the Imperial Guard to bring back the head of the young hero responsible for his army's defeatâ€¦ Bruc: The Manhunt
